label: [Node-RED2UML] Convert Node-RED flow to Mermaid
info:
::: aim

To convert an Node-RED flow to a Mermaid flow diagram.

:::

::: requirements

This flow requires the ClientCode node from the [introspection](https://flows.nodered.org/node/@gregoriusrippenstein/node-red-contrib-introspection) node package.

:::

::: explanation

This flow will take the *frontend* version of the flow and convert it to a [Mermaid](https://mermaid.js.org/syntax/flowchart.html) flow diagram.

The flow diagram will be dumped to the debug panel.

To test the resulst, use the [Mermaid live editor](https://mermaid.live/edit)

:::

::: discussion 

This flow is far from perfect and probably has many bugs, I have not done extensive testing. 


Any bugs, suggestions or feedback, please use the feedback link below and send me an email.

:::

### Example

```mermaid
%% change this to LR Node-RED like UML
graph TB
5888a25fe394e1ae[Obtain Frontend Flow] --> 5f4cb3222cd07e7d[create mermaid from nodes]
5888a25fe394e1ae[Obtain Frontend Flow] --> 48fb357610d1c1bd(original frontend flow)
5e44fd936947eec3[generate mermaid code] --> 5888a25fe394e1ae[Obtain Frontend Flow]
5f4cb3222cd07e7d[create mermaid from nodes] --> 2896702daf4d90c1(mermaid flow diagram)
559f50ab6c63e19a[catch] --> 96d9a3eb9ce50f98(error)
```
